display.title: Display Settings
display.zoomHint: Adjust the UI scale. Try a lower value (e.g., 80%) if the layout feels cramped on high-resolution screens.
display.languageHint: Change the application interface language. Changes take effect immediately.

output.title: Output Settings
output.bilingualHint: Bilingual mode displays both original and translated text in subtitles.

translation.title: Translation and Proofreading Services
translation.geminiKeyHint: Uses Gemini Flash for primary translation, and Gemini Pro for advanced tasks like glossary extraction and proofreading.
translation.geminiEndpointHint: Set a custom base URL. Useful for proxies or API gateways.

transcription.title: Speech Recognition
transcription.openaiKeyHint: Uses OpenAI's Whisper model for high-accuracy speech-to-text.
transcription.openaiEndpointHint: Custom API endpoint for local models, proxy, or third-party gateway.

localWhisperSettings.modelPathDesc: Use local Whisper model (GGML format) for speech transcription, runs completely offline.
localWhisperSettings.binaryPathDesc:
Manually specify the Whisper executable path, overriding auto-detection.
To use GPU acceleration, please specify a GPU-enabled version of whisper-cli.exe.
localWhisperSettings.instructionGgml: Requires a .bin model file in GGML format
localWhisperSettings.instructionBinaries: Ensure whisper-cli.exe is in the same directory as its dependencies (e.g. dlls). Do not move the exe alone. Recommended: Select after unzipping.
localWhisperSettings.instructionDocs: For detailed setup guide, see the

batch.title: Batch Processing
batch.proofreadBatchSizeHint: Number of subtitles per proofreading batch. Larger values provide better context and quality but consume more tokens.
batch.translationBatchSizeHint: Number of subtitles per translation batch. Larger values provide better context and quality but consume more tokens.
batch.chunkDurationHint: Target length of audio segments (seconds), affects parallel transcription efficiency.

concurrency.title: Concurrency & Timeout
concurrency.concurrencyFlashHint: Apply to: Main Pipeline (Transcription Refinement, Translation), Whisper API Transcription, Timestamp Repair.
concurrency.concurrencyProHint: Apply to: Glossary Extraction, Translation Proofreading.
concurrency.localConcurrencyHint: Apply to: Timestamp Alignment, Local Whisper Transcription.
concurrency.requestTimeoutHint: Maximum wait time for a single API request. Increase for slow networks or large batches.

audio.title: Audio Processing
audio.smartSplitDesc: Use AI voice detection to split audio at natural pauses, improving transcription accuracy (recommended)

cache.title: Video Preview Cache
cache.hint: Cached video previews allow faster loading when reopening the same video.

speaker.title: Speaker Recognition
speaker.enableDiarizationDesc: Detects and separates different speakers in the audio pipeline.
speaker.enablePreAnalysisDesc: Analyze audio before transcription to identify speaker count and voice characteristics. Improves accuracy but takes longer.
speaker.includeSpeakerInExportDesc: Display speaker names in subtitle files (e.g., Speaker A: dialogue content)
speaker.useSpeakerColorsDesc: Assign different colors to different speakers (ASS format only)
speaker.styledTranslationDesc: Adjust translation tone based on speaker characteristics (formal/casual)

glossary.title: Glossary Settings
glossary.enableAutoGlossaryDesc: Automatically identify and extract professional terms to improve translation accuracy and consistency
glossary.sampleDurationHint: Use the first N minutes of audio for term extraction. 'Full audio' provides more comprehensive terms but takes longer.
glossary.autoConfirmDesc: Apply extracted terms directly without manual confirmation. New terms will be merged into the currently active glossary (if none exists, a new one will be created).

alignment.title: Timestamp Alignment
alignment.modeHint: Select whether to use CTC alignment for precise timestamp adjustment.
alignment.ctcConfigDesc: Configure the path for CTC alignment model.
alignment.instructionAligner: Download align.exe from the project releases page
alignment.instructionModel: Requires downloading the model separately. See documentation for details.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Mock mode allows skipping actual API requests or specific stages to test workflows and save quota.

startFrom.title: Start Pipeline From
startFrom.desc: Start execution from this stage, skipping previous steps. Uses file/preset data as input. (Enabling this automatically skips blocking steps like Speaker Analysis and Term Extraction)

mockStage.title: Mock Start Stage
mockStage.desc: Start from the selected stage, skipping ALL stages before it. E.g., selecting 'Refinement' skips transcription and starts from refinement. Only the first chunk is processed in mock mode.

mockData.title: Mock Data File
mockData.hint: Input data for the mock start stage. Leave empty to use preset placeholder data (a single test subtitle with no real content). Provide a real subtitle file to effectively test subsequent stages.

debug.saveIntermediateArtifactsDesc: Save intermediate files (Whisper raw results, proofreading, translation) to the log directory for debugging analysis

privacy.title: Data & Privacy
privacy.description: This application will collect anonymous diagnostic data and error reports to help us continuously improve product stability.
